column1: 212313,Director of Photography,,"Supervise technical operations of production to ensure creative direction is realised
column3: Collaborate with others to determine technical details of productions
column5: Determine how best to represent a concept visually
column9: Provide creative leadership to ensure production has desired effect, mood or style
column13: Determine technical requirements of productions or projects
column17: Study scripts to determine project requirements
column19: Set up still or video cameras or related equipment
column21: Operate still or video cameras or related equipment
column23: Review details of technical drawings or specifications
column25: Edit audio, photographs or video recordings
column27: Manage content of broadcasts or presentations
column41: Collaborate with others to prepare or perform artistic productions
